data.name: RimWorld Backstory in Game Access
data.detailed_description:
This DLC gives you the right to enter a name and character backstory into the game, with skills, appearance, and special work requirements.

Write yourself as an interplanetary detective, an entrepreneur, an ex-artist, or anything else you can think of. Players will recruit, command, and fight you for all time!

You'll enter your content through our creative rewards system where we'll either approve it or give feedback if it doesn't quite fit.

Your content must follow the creative rewards guidelines.

(Note: This DLC does not change gameplay in any way - it only gives you the right to enter your content into the game. Also please note you can only have one entry per Steam account; purchasing multiple DLC tiers gives access to the highest one.)

data.short_description: Enter your name and backstory into the game. Players will recruit, command, and fight you for all time! (All content must follow the guidelines.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 with 384 MB of RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 with 384 MB of RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 with 384 MB of RAM
